name: UKO -  UI Kit & Dashboard Design System
description:
Hey Everyone! ❤️


We are very delighted to let you know that our brand-new Figma Design system & UiKit is now available for Free.

Preview Full Version


We've packed a lot of useful features, Pre Built Pages, and highly scalable components into this Design system. 


Therefore, we believe you can create Your Web app & admin dashboard with almost no effort.


❤️ The Good News is: It's Free 🔥 ❤️

Download the full version for free.


Here are some of the key features that we have added to this template.


🌟🌟🌟 Key Features :


❤️ Auto Layout

❤️ Component-Based

❤️ Well Organized

❤️ Smart, scalable typography system

❤️ Production-ready examples

❤️ Dashboards, settings pages, and more

❤️ Easy to Scale



🌟🌟🌟 50+ Pages and 150+ Components


🔥 5+ Dashboards

🔥 8+ Application Pages

🔥 150+ Pre Made Components

🔥 50+ Prebuild Widgets

🔥 20+ Charts Examples

🔥 2+ Profile pages

🔥 4+ Session Pages


Download the full version for free.

Feel free to share your feedback and questions.


Thank You
